Value: Lion Energy Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, development, production, and investment in oil and gas properties in Indonesia. It holds a 2.5% participating interest in the Seram (Non Bula) block production sharing contract (PSC) that covers an area of 1,353 square kilometers located on the Seram Island in eastern Indonesia; and 60% interest in the East Seram PSC covering an area of 6,505 square kilometers located in Indonesia. Lion Energy Limited was incorporated in 1970 and is based in Subiaco, Australia.
